description: WebExtensionConfig stores the configuration information for the webextension.

ID.description: ID is the identifier of the object.

allowProxySettings.description: Allows the web extension to set the proxy settings of the employee's browser.

importHash.description: The hash of the structure used to compare with new import version.

importLabel.description:
The user-defined import label that allows the system to group resources from the
same import operation.

name.description: The name of the webextension configuration.

refreshWebExtensionConfigInterval.description:
Defines the refresh interval in minutes for the configuration of the deployed
web extensions.

reportVisitedURLsInterval.description: Define the interval in minutes between two reports of the visited URLs.

updateTime.description: Last update date of the object.
